title: Joint PET-MRI Reconstruction with Diffusion Stochastic Differential Model
details: T Xie, Z Cui, C Liu, C Luo, H Wang, Y Zhang, X Wang… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: PET suffers from a low signal-to-noise ratio. Meanwhile, the k-space data acquisition process in MRI is time-consuming by PET-MRI systems. We aim to accelerate MRI and improve PET image quality. This paper proposed a novel joint reconstruction …
